projects.title: Community Mission Progress Viewer
projects.description: This project/website allows you to look through the Community Mission Progress over time. In order to gather more data on this, we started recording the progress of the Community Missions.

projects.title: Game Updates
projects.description: This project aims to show the latest update available for No Man's Sky per platform.

projects.title: NMS Archive
projects.description: A repository to archive mbin/exml files of different nms versions to give easy access to modders.

projects.title: No Man's Sky - Universal Font
projects.description: As far as we have observed, there have been two fonts that carry the iconic NMS typographic style: the "NMSGeoSansLight" webfont in use on the official NMS site, and an alternative version datamined from the game files that seems to be based on the Futura Pro font family. This project aims to bring to creators the fixed versions of the fonts.

projects.title: Community Search
projects.description: This project aims to be the "Yellow pages" of the NMS community. Our goal is to document the different Communities, tools, resources, builders and creators.

projects.title: DE-EN-lang-Archive
projects.description: A repository to archive mbin/exml language files of different nms versions.

projects.title: DDS-Archive
projects.description: A repository to archive DDS texture files of different nms versions.

projects.title: Creature Builder
projects.description: This is a tool to help people craft NMS creatures by allowing you to select the parts that can be used together.

projects.title: Expedition Alphabet
projects.description: A secret No Man's Sky alphabet was teased with the Expedition releases. Once the Beachhead Expedition was released we were able to get most of the letters of the alphabet. This project displays all of the characters that we are pretty sure link up to the English Alphabet.

projects.title: NMSUIPreview
projects.description: Load UI files and see what they look like in game.

projects.title: Atlas Pass
projects.description: Create your own Atlas Pass quickly and easily using this NMSCD tool! Easily upload custom backgrounds and images, style text, snap elements to the grid, manage layers and so much more!

projects.title: RewardTableTools
projects.description: Filter the REWARDTABLE by reward or by item and get chances for each reward item.

projects.title: Base-Relocator
projects.description: Move or copy your base to another location in the NMS universe.

projects.title: Base-Reorder
projects.description: Reorder the bases shown in the teleporter menu.

projects.title: LangFileGenerator
projects.description: Convert EXML language files into more readable textfiles.

projects.title: NMS Coordinate Converter
projects.description: Convert glyphs/coords to save format coordinates.

projects.title: No Man's Guide
projects.description: A second-screen companion app for the game "No Man's Sky." A convenient way to see location, crafting, and cooking data for over one hundred in-game items (and growing). Future updates tentatively include translations for the various alien languages.

projects.title: No Man's Sky - Crafting Map
projects.description: No Man's Sky crafting & refining walk through interactive graph

projects.title: NMS Color Parser
projects.description: This mini app reads the exml files and shows the colors of each property visually. The number represents the index of that color in their parent property.

projects.title: No Man's Sky - Enhanced Images
projects.description: The game files contain images that have mostly a 256px resolution, there are a few that are only 128px. YakuzaSuske went through all of the images and enhanced them to 1024px and made the optimised images available to everyone.

projects.title: Image Compressor
projects.description: Compresses images to 10MB or less for use on the NMS wiki.

projects.title: Teleport Editor
projects.description: Add, remove and edit teleport endpoints in your save data.

projects.title: Building Charts
projects.description: Visualise data about your base part counts.

projects.title: exml_2_lua
projects.description: Convert EXML files to lua tables and vice versa.

projects.title: NMS Wiki Page Creator
projects.description: This project/website allows you to easily make the necessary code so that you can easily upload your discoveries to the No Man's Sky wiki.

projects.title: Frigate Calculator
projects.description: Get a rating for a frigate before buying it.

projects.title: NMS Glyph Randomizer
projects.description: A simple glyph generator to help you discover places you've never been before!
